  • Method Details

    • createDirective

      default Directive createDirective(ParserDirective parserDirective, String[] args)
      Default creation method for a directive from parser directive and arguments.
      Parameters:
      parserDirective - type of the directive
      args - arguments of the directive
      Returns:
      the created directive
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the arguments could not be parsed
      DirectiveException - if the directive could not be created
